player

Interface Strategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Aggressive, Benevolent, Cheater, Human, Random

    public interface Strategy
    Interface that implements the different strategies of the players
    Since:
    1.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player attack(Player player, Player mapPlayer)
      This the abstract method for which implementation will be provided in the classes which implement this interface.

    • Method Detail

      • reinforcement

        Player reinforcement(Player player,
                     RiskMap map)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        This the abstract method for which implementation will be provided in the classes which implement this interface. This method is for the reinforcement of the countries owned by the player.
        Parameters:
        player - We pass the player object who is currently playing the game.
        map - We pass the map object where the map is loaded
        Returns:
        enriched player object is returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if error

      • attack

        Player attack(Player player,
              Player mapPlayer)
        This the abstract method for which implementation will be provided in the classes which implement this interface. This method is for the attack iin which player may decide to attack neighboring countries or not
        Parameters:
        player - We pass the player object who is currently playing the game.
        mapPlayer - We pass the mapPlayer object
        Returns:
        enriched player object is returned

      • fortification

        Player fortification(Player player,
                     RiskMap map)
        This the abstract method for which implementation will be provided in the classes which implement this interface. This method is for the fortification in which
        Parameters:
        player - We pass the player object who is currently playing the game.
        map - We pass the map object where the map is loaded
        Returns:
        enriched player object is returned

      • deployArmies

        Player deployArmies(Player player,
                    RiskMap map)
        This the abstract method for which implementation will be provided in the classes which implement this interface. This method is for the deploying armies in the startup and reinforcement phases
        Parameters:
        player - We pass the player object who is currently playing the game.
        map - We pass the map object where the map is loaded
        Returns:
        enriched player object is returned
